section.title: Deleting a Tag
section.para: When a tag is no longer needed, remove it.

step.para: Click the Tags tab on the left side of the screen.
Select the tag you wish to delete.
Click Remove to open the Remove Tag(s) window. The message warns you that removing the tag will also remove all descendants of the tag.
Click OK to delete the selected tag.

section.para: You have removed the tag and all its descendants. The tag is also removed from all the objects that it was attached to.
